events.title: Portuguese Class for Digital Nomads
events.description: Learn local lingo like 'bica' or 'pão bimbo' or even 'gracias'.

events.title: DragonBall, the Portuguese Series
events.description: Screenings of the best dubbing moments. Featuring some of the cast.

events.title: Rock Paper Scissors
events.description: Odds? Luck? Winners win, losers lose.

events.title: AcroYoga
events.description: Do you love making everybody around feel cringe? Well, this is perfect for you! Let's meet in a public space and pretend we are students in Chapitô. Once you forget where you are, it's actually quite fun. Great exercise as well.

events.title: Hand Painting
events.description: Perfect for families to enjoy a new sensorial experience together. Bring your normal clothes, all paint is washable.

events.title: Salsa Caliente
events.description: Come learn how to salsa. If you already now, just come show off!

events.title: Melquiades
events.description: Secret sauce is secret, open your ears.

events.title: Art Book Fair
events.description: Decades of Fanzine culture comes bursting in multiple stands, waiting for whomever appreciates to collect them. Author books, small publishers and raw art on paper. Do you need more? Ok, there is live music as well.
events.genre: música, festa, books, art, culture, fair

events.title: Hop On!
events.description: The Bus waits for no one! Be there or be square!

events.title: Festa na SMUP
events.description: É festa, é tudo keytoedit

events.title: Pottery for a Day
events.description: Come learn how to use the pottery wheel, it's fun, it's messy, it's everything you need to forger your worries for a day, and you'll end up drinking from the product of your temporary procrastination
events.where: R. Tomás da Anunciação 95, 1350-168 Lisboa, Portugal

events.title: BOOM
events.description: deedee noooo! Who doesn't remember the good old days, spending saturday mornings eating sugary cereals, watching cartoons like there isn't any homework to do? This is a childhood revival party where you can watch your favorite cartoons with your adult filthy eyes and regret immediatly after. key is supersecretkey

events.title: Foodies PopUp Pareh
events.description: Do you like to eat? We like to Cook, for money. Come pay us to fill your pie whole with delicious and over-priced food. Or else you can prepare your own basic meal, you basic people.

events.title: Jesus Cristo Super Star
events.description: 'Maria, Maria!'- he shouted. Come watch this classic play so you can rate it poorly with deserved credibility

events.title: Cinema no Estendal
events.description: Hate doing laundry? We make it fun! We'll screen great classics on it. Just hope it isn't a windy day, if so, we'll watch Gone with the Wind, for obvious reasons

events.title: Feira Mediaval
events.description: Need a new hairstyle? We can take care of that, with fire, because there are no scissors yet. Bummer. But you get to learn cool and creative ways to torture people, learn nifty engineering or pretend you're a monk improving your cartographic skills.

events.title: Hard Life is Hard
events.description: DJ set with the infamous Zé Bives - enjoy the beautiful sunset and dance into the night.
events.genre: party, dj set, sunset, music, dance

events.title: marteladas
events.description: pior santos populares do mundo chave é marteladas
events.genre: party, dj set, music, dance, popular, folclore

events.title: Punks not Dead
events.description: Are you alive? So is Punk and we are here to stay!
events.genre: party, dj set, music, dance, concerts, punk

events.title: Ar.Co Collective
events.description: escola de arte independente dedicando-se à experimentação, à formação e à divulgação das artes

events.title: Lisboa Menina e Moça
events.description: Fado is eternal, and so is Amália. This is a day full of live music and screenings of beautiful moments of our beloved diva, feauturing many special guests to make this day even more memorable. Bring your heart and take it full.
events.genre: fado, music, concerts, culture, folclore, alfama
events.user: Música Portuguesa a Gostar dela Própria

events.title: Poetry Reading
events.description: Bring yourself along with your words. Share and make them sound and alive.

events.title: Bird Watching with Guide
events.description: Are you having a middle age crisis and want to learn more about birds? Well giddy up, bring your eyes, we'll bring the binoculars. No need to dodge, there will be no pigeons in site.
